attributes.additional_details: I want the government to grant this power because it appears the government are powerless to stop them, if they actually want to. It’s ok to drag your feet and bring one stupid scheme after the other when it’s not your money you’re spending. It’s the tax payer paying for government  incompetence and it’s costing billions. IT NEEDS TO STOP!!!
attributes.background: Give private individuals the power to patrol and turn the boats back before they land on our shores.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the crossing of the Channel by small boats, but we're not sure exactly what powers you like the Government or Parliament to grant private individuals regarding these crossings.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Create international waters in Dover Strait, and turn back migrant boats: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641012
